items.title: ANONYMOUS - Browse Freely
items.author: System
items.excerpt: You're currently browsing as ANONYMOUS. View curated public feeds, see how scoring works, explore the interface. No account required.

items.title: ENHANCE - Connect Your Sources
items.author: System
items.excerpt: Sign in to connect your own feed sources. Pull from LinkedIn, Twitter/X, RSS feeds. Get personalized scoring, save your mute filters, track your preferences across devices.

items.title: HARD COPY - Full Access
items.author: System
items.excerpt: Unlock HARD COPY for complete access: WIRE MODE headline normalization, advanced DEDUP clustering, API access, TERM CLI, data export. Support the project.
